room_title: Escape room "The Tower" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: We had the best time! The tower room was challenging and fun! I can't wait to go back again with even more friends!

room_title: Escape room "The Tower" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: Went into this expecting it to be incredibly boring and lame. Had a great time! Will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "The Tower" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: This was the coolest thing I've ever done! I had a blast and would definitely recommend it to all of my friends!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Tower" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: We had a blast!! Will definitely be back to try another room. I loved how challenging it was even with a group of 6 adults... We escaped with just 80 seconds to spare!

room_title: Escape room "The Tower" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: We had the best time. What a great way to make memories. The staff is amazing. I can't wait to come back!

room_title: Escape room "The Tower" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: I had the best time doing this! It was such a rush and super thrilling! I recommend it for anyone who loves things like this!

room_title: Escape room "The Tower" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: This place is awesome!! Did the tower tonight-- the hour went by so quick! So much fun and the staff was so friendly and accomodating. Definately, a unique and memorable experience!
